channel.title: [PI] Npc Drop System
channel.description:
i know the drop system is made to have one drop rarity amount so you cant really change different percentage drop rates. is there anyway to change the format to doing this..
NPC ID - ID for Drops - ID amount dropped - Percentage Dropped
Anyone help me code that?
